title.narrative: SCHOOL BASED MANAGMENT

description.narrative: School-based management, action and monitoring is mainstreamed and operationalized in selected governorates, which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, children of basic and post-basic school age, especially girls, have increased and more equitable access to quality learning in a progressively strengthened education system, including in humanitarian situations

participating-org.narrative: GENERAL DIRECTORATE OF EDUCATION IN KIRKUK

mailing-address.narrative: C/o UNICEF Amman P.O. Box 1551 Amman 11821

sector.narrative: Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
System strengthening - gender-responsive teaching and learning (excluding SRGBV)
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: School-based management, action and monitoring is mainstreamed and operationalized in selected governorates

description.narrative: Expansion of the School-Based Management approach improved learning environments in 374 schools in Iraq benefitting 290,279 children. Teachers and PTA members acquired skills in planning, budgeting and reporting, and are able to formulate and implement their school improvement plans setting objectives and priorities to enable them to deliver quality education. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/01/2019
